function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Regulated air travel may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Impact":"Increased transmission of infectious diseases due to the movement of infected individuals","Mitigation":"Implementing strict screening measures and quarantine protocols for travelers","Technologies":"Rapid testing technologies for air passengers","People":"Travelers, airport staff, and residents of destination countries","Owner":"Airport authorities, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate testing intensity can lead to underreporting of COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Failure to identify and isolate infected individuals, leading to continued disease spread","Mitigation":"Increasing testing capacity and accessibility, especially in high-risk areas","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, mobile testing units","People":"Public health agencies, healthcare workers, and the general population","Owner":"Government health ministries, private healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Limited health expenditure may result in insufficient healthcare resources during a pandemic","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, shortage of medical supplies, and increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Increasing healthcare funding, stockpiling essential medical resources, and expanding healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health platforms, medical supply chain management systems","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government health ministries, international aid organizations"}]}
